thread.title: Soma Bay celebrates success at Cityscape Exhibition
thread.title_full: Soma Bay celebrates success at Cityscape Exhibition

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: Soma Bay celebrates success at Cityscape Exhibition
text:
Soma Bay celebrates success at Cityscape Exhibition Soma Bay celebrates success at Cityscape Exhibition Details   10:10 ASDC awarded the Community, Culture and Tourism project award ASDC, the lead developer behind the renowned Soma Bay resort in Egypt, is delighted to announce that it was awarded the Community, Culture and Tourism project award at the Cityscape Exhibition in Cairo. Soma Bay triumphed against 23 other major developers for this highly acclaimed accolade which celebrates the resort’s wide variety of ongoing projects including new hotels and real estate opportunities, illustrating the resort’s continued commitment to promoting Egypt’s tourism industry. 
Demonstrating the future development of the resort, Soma Bay also announced the launch of the new Marina and Bay Side development which will take advantage of Egypt’s stunning scenery, utilising the unique site location on the Red Sea, to create a dramatic design feature offering panoramic views of the whole bay. Celebrating excellence in real estate development and architecture, ASDC was also shortlisted in three additional categories at Cityscape including the Mixed Use Project Award – Future, Leisure & Hospitality Project Award – Future and Residential Project Award. Located just a stone’s throw away from Central Europe, Soma Bay is Egypt’s best kept secret and considered the leading location for scuba diving, snorkelling, wind surfing, sailing and kite surfing. With year-round sunshine, spectacular dive sites and idyllic white beaches, Soma Bay offers the ultimate real estate escape. Equally ideal for both investment and personal inspiration, Soma Bay’s diverse residential properties combine the comforts of home, the ease of a resort, and the luxury of the Red Sea.
